item.title: 特朗普说，比伊朗 - 以色列停火的理由“大得多”离开G7峰会 - 福布斯

item.title: 乌克兰的Zelenskiy寻求G7支持作为特朗普的早期退出峰会 - 路透社
item.description: 乌克兰的Zelenskiy寻求G7的支持，因为特朗普的早期退出董事峰会＆nbsp; 当俄罗斯击中乌克兰时，Zelensky的G-7到达被特朗普的退出＆nbsp; nbsp; wsj> wsj Zelenskyy说，他将在G7 Summit上购买特朗普购买乌克兰武器href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilafbvv95cuxov3nelwtwwwwwwdliltnmbxheqtb1sepbznznznzfv0nqzng3sdl1nxkyvldod0pxv eqwqxfebutubdnuwgoyzex0n0xsyxrks2fqyuhanenaserkmecwwty0stzvyw9rrudctulaber5qzjiefa3z3v1ajnjqtqtqtqtqxnvu2ekxnvu2ekg2ekg2zgxmof9nnn2vhe VZoT2tSZ1JHWExa0gGaAUFVX3lxTE01UU9iR2Nuc1VpdU4yX2Zjd3BtejNqMGJqTDFrbDNuUnlGME1mcXBtSzZTLWJ0c1NQMC1WZlRuZHlONWNyb3lrQ w5icvzsue9dwjbczw5qvmgwsmvwsuy2lvpldm9ndkhby1febhv4wld3tvcwvhfoym1uzs1mee54yznft0zmv0zmvtheed00odvlohmwtmwtmkzulb6see？ target =“ _ blank”> EU领导人要求在G7 Summit上对俄罗斯进行更严格的制裁＆nbsp; nbsp; Kyiv Independent Zelenskyy想与特朗普谈论乌克兰愿意购买的新武器套餐＆nbsp; nbsp; oullip> oullip6f6f“

item.description: 特朗普政府称重增加了36个国家/地区的旅行禁令，备忘录说＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约邮报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmid0fvx3lxte44wjhkd1hszlhwn1o4ym93xzrhsgnuned2x2x2lgn3vaadbos2p sztzeu2Y4NXZOBMTONGN1EG1FVLNFVK9OZUP5V3J0S1PTCKDYBWPQZG80R0JHR21JRMTFNKFNKFNKFNKFNKFNKFJSWE2EELYELYTE1WV2V2VUN00ZCVGHV？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”> 36个国家可能会添加到特朗普的旅行禁令中 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitwFBVV95cUxPcEdLS0NGN3NVdUNsTjdaaTc0S0plUVZFeXJMSGZVelZLcHNyRFFHYkVIRUNhbHpnOXdSMFR6V014V2IxcGVjaUF1eXl elvlta0xpetyza0hbs0ixtc1artjmagj2vnlgvzhzx3ptwdvjx0pnrkduahl4v3lrdf9mt3hwtt HJR0YZAFL0ZMFMANRTYLG2U3V3AEVTMKTTVJCD1J2BKHKZLF6DFP2VEFKMXGMXG1ALNOU1K？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普政府可以对数十个国家实施旅行禁令＆nbsp; nbsp; npr 对美国人和法定居民的移民限制＆nbsp; nbsp; forbes 美国扩大旅行禁令到二十五个非洲国家，包括埃塞俄比亚，加纳，尼日利亚，马拉维，塞内加尔和喀麦隆，新更新，您需要知道＆nbsp;＆nbsp;＆nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f”＃6f6f6f“＃6f6f”

item.title: 内塔尼亚胡在与伊朗战争中的真正目标是他不公开承认的目标 - 哈雷兹
item.description: 内塔尼亚胡在与伊朗战争中的真正目标是他不公开承认＆nbsp; nbsp; haaretz 以色列 - 伊朗冲突＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 纽约时报 解释：以色列伊朗曾经是'朋友'。这导致了他们的分手＆nbsp;＆nbsp; ndtv 伊朗说，议会正在准备账单，以离开核不扩散条约＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipAFBVV95cUxOSlBZNjJoc0hoaUJNZkpfYXdaRVFjTnozaHNKTGtRRWg0SVMwV1dnTTlvdVBSaWloY05DNFlFWFViLW 03MUC0ZFG0SZNGMGXGX0PRNXPHCUZ6UTHPBGF1QW9QCWCTCKKTGEKTGEKTGEKTGEKTGEKTGEKTGEKTGEKTGEKTGEKTGEKTGEKTGEKTGR3TR3TR3BPRXNQOG1UCVIXAFNURHBOUHBOUHBOUHBOUHBOUXJOV2 target =“ _ blank”>以色列比赛以几个检查＆nbsp; nbsp; wsj

item.title: 在G7上，特朗普在与盟友的裂谷中更新了普京的拥抱 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 在G7上，特朗普更新了与盟友的裂谷中的普京＆nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmid0fvx3lxtfbnetdnt3ngmwmwpprxztunfhn2xbvxvxvsctjwu1pp nefkynh6uvizmdrrs2fpsexuukd2EG9KB0XMZTFPM1JETWVDCG5QWNJCX1CYB1FRWHVN1U4MWJT2JJT2JFRHR4ZR4ZZV0LXDBT1HR cuhou1pzvldregvj0gf8qvvffmts12yuppmxv1nevychj0yjvbys1saek0dervahe3bwnfwnfwwjvuxp1r1r1m4sgpqznr0vkvh qnpwqwhpdnpjmnfcqwtbr21jmffoafrwmmi0a0a0a0zitveydk1abupaogtxdxdxdxdttowfwzuxywxpys09iahdizev4wvkzsg？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>事实检查：在G7上，特朗普对特鲁多，乌克兰和移民提出了虚假主张 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmivwfbvv95cuxnymz1wxdksnk2skl2xx2 fvd3djeffatk9JMHVTQ2FGEWC2VEC3EJH1VGZTAGI4TXPGWWK1NG5JC2TMSLVMSLVMSVMSVHHLWDYWKS5DEP0 zlffmtrxvjfvwtdkdtzhwfjprxayegvqulnqz2xrqkjrb2rrvet1cdzfzfz3njz3njz0nmslfhnkjqzjjjkmx pbytbhz0n1uzu1rgj2z0lydjjryw5kdgtzdtjjjdky5cejwnjawannjannvzkxnqvoxaknmnzlyvq？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>唐纳德·特朗普（Donald Trump href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmingfbvv95cuxoame5ec1rowf0s19wdkzdcmxpnxzfsti3v1hsti3v1hsti3v1hsthsthrkady3vgnsthrkhsthremvhs0nxanhiakkkkkkkkkkkkkk3rkk3rk9orwdppnwdppnw tudxjzwkruxzhjyw9tmvlakak1qt0gzuufiwnjuznjuznpizfpfffpffpffzuvgdwlmv2o3txv4wnytd010nk1jmzhwb0jmquggggggggg0lkb3llvzlkb3llvzlyhis2zlnjvpnjvpnjvpnjvpnm4xdplid target =“ _ blank”>特朗普想将G7转移到G8中，甚至是中国的G9 ＆nbsp; nbsp; ap News 克里姆林宫调用g7'无用'，与特朗普一致认为，踢出俄罗斯是一个错误＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS
